text: Galaga is a sci-fi arcade game released by Namco in 1981. It is the sequel to Galaxian. In this game, the player controls a spaceship and shoots enemies coming down in different directions. The game was published by Chunsoft and developed by Namco. ==More Reading== *Sellers, John (2001). Arcade Fever: The Fan's Guide to the Golden Age of Video Games. title: Galaga
